description: Page-level classification and human-readable compliance checks for building consent documents

floor_plan.name: Floor Plan
floor_plan.description: Architectural drawing showing room layout, dimensions and door/window positions

site_plan.name: Site Plan
site_plan.description: Drawing showing property boundaries, buildings, setbacks and site layout

elevation.name: Elevation
elevation.description: External view of building showing height, materials, and facade details

section.name: Section
section.description: Cross-sectional view showing internal structure and heights

detail.name: Detail Drawing
detail.description: Enlarged detail showing construction methods, materials and assemblies

schedule.name: Schedule
schedule.description: Table or list of specifications, windows, doors, or finishes

cover_sheet.name: Cover Sheet
cover_sheet.description: Title page with project information, drawing list, and general notes

form.name: Form
form.description: Official form such as building consent application or certificate

certificate.name: Certificate
certificate.description: Official certificate including producer statements, compliance certificates

report.name: Report
report.description: Technical or inspection report with findings

photo.name: Photo
photo.description: Photograph or image of site, construction or product

table.name: Table
table.description: Standalone table of data or specifications

specification.name: Product Specification
specification.description: Technical specifications for products including installation requirements

unknown.name: Unknown
unknown.description: Page type could not be determined

checks.name: Scale Indicator
checks.prompt: Does this page have a scale indicator (e.g., 1:100, 1:50, scale bar)?

checks.name: North Arrow
checks.prompt: Is there a north arrow or north direction indicator on this plan?

checks.name: Dimensions Marked
checks.prompt: Are dimensions clearly marked on this drawing (room sizes, setbacks, heights)?

checks.name: Room Labels
checks.prompt: Are all rooms labelled with their intended use (e.g., Bedroom, Kitchen, Living)?

checks.name: Floor Level Identifier
checks.prompt: Is the floor level or storey clearly identified (e.g., Ground Floor, Level 1)?

checks.name: Door Positions
checks.prompt: Are door positions and swing directions shown on this floor plan?

checks.name: Window Positions
checks.prompt: Are window positions indicated on this floor plan?

checks.name: Boundary Dimensions
checks.prompt: Are all property boundary dimensions shown on this site plan?

checks.name: Site Area
checks.prompt: Is the total site area specified on this site plan?

checks.name: Setback Dimensions
checks.prompt: Are setback distances from boundaries shown for buildings on this site plan?

checks.name: Existing Buildings
checks.prompt: Are existing buildings or structures shown and labelled on this site plan?

checks.name: Proposed Works
checks.prompt: Are proposed works clearly identified and distinguished from existing on this plan?

checks.name: Elevation Direction
checks.prompt: Is the elevation direction clearly identified (e.g., North Elevation, Street Elevation)?

checks.name: Height Dimensions
checks.prompt: Are building heights shown on this elevation (floor to ceiling, overall height)?

checks.name: Ground Level (RL)
checks.prompt: Is the ground level or finished floor level shown (RL - Reduced Level)?

checks.name: External Materials
checks.prompt: Are external materials and finishes indicated on this elevation?

checks.name: Detail Title
checks.prompt: Is this detail drawing clearly titled and labelled?

checks.name: Materials Identified
checks.prompt: Are materials and components clearly identified in this detail?

checks.name: Drawing Date
checks.prompt: Is a drawing date or revision date shown on this page?

checks.name: Author/Company
checks.prompt: Is the author, designer or company who prepared this drawing shown?

checks.name: Site Address
checks.prompt: Is the site/property address shown on this page?

checks.name: Legal Description
checks.prompt: Is the legal description (Lot/DP reference) shown?

checks.name: Consent Number
checks.prompt: Is a building consent or application number shown?

checks.name: Signature Present
checks.prompt: Is a signature present on this document?

checks.name: Date Signed
checks.prompt: Is the document dated?

checks.name: Manufacturer Name
checks.prompt: Is the manufacturer name clearly shown?

checks.name: Model Number
checks.prompt: Is the product model name or number shown?

checks.name: Clearance Requirements
checks.prompt: Are clearance or spacing requirements specified?

checks.name: Standards Compliance
checks.prompt: Are compliance standards referenced (AS/NZS)?

checks.name: Installation Instructions
checks.prompt: Are installation instructions present?

checks.name: Registration/Accreditation
checks.prompt: Is the issuer's registration or accreditation number shown (LBP, CPEng, etc.)?

checks.name: Scope of Work
checks.prompt: Is the scope of work or certification clearly defined?

checks.name: Site Coverage Compliance
checks.prompt: Based on the site plan, does the site coverage appear to be within typical limits (35-40%)?

checks.name: Height Limit Compliance
checks.prompt: Based on the elevations, does the building height appear to be within typical residential limits (8-9m)?

checks.name: Setback Compliance
checks.prompt: Do the setback distances shown meet typical minimum requirements (front 4.5m, side 1.5m)?

checks.name: Vehicle Access
checks.prompt: Is vehicle access or driveway shown on the site plan?

checks.name: Stormwater Disposal
checks.prompt: Is stormwater disposal indicated on the site plan?

checks.name: Schedule Completeness
checks.prompt: Does this schedule contain all required entries with complete information (no blank fields)?

checks.name: Schedule References
checks.prompt: Do the items in this schedule reference specific drawing numbers or locations?

checks.name: Manufacturer Details
checks.prompt: Is the manufacturer name and contact information provided?

checks.name: Model Information
checks.prompt: Is the product model name or number specified?

checks.name: Installation Requirements
checks.prompt: Are installation requirements or clearances specified?

checks.name: Certificate Signed
checks.prompt: Is this certificate signed by the certifier?

checks.name: Certificate Dated
checks.prompt: Is there a date on this certificate?

checks.name: Certificate Reference
checks.prompt: Does the certificate reference the specific project, address, or consent number?

checks.name: Form Completeness
checks.prompt: Are all required fields on this form filled in (no blank mandatory fields)?

checks.name: Form Signed
checks.prompt: Is this form signed where required?

checks.name: Letter Dated
checks.prompt: Is there a date on this letter?

checks.name: Letter Signed
checks.prompt: Is this letter signed?

checks.name: Report Author
checks.prompt: Is the report author or company identified?

checks.name: Report Dated
checks.prompt: Is there a date on this report?

checks.name: Report Findings
checks.prompt: Does the report include clear findings or conclusions?

checks.name: Drawing List
checks.prompt: Is there a drawing list or index on this cover sheet?

checks.name: Project Information
checks.prompt: Is the project name, address, or description provided on this cover sheet?

checks.name: Photo Labelled
checks.prompt: Is this photo labelled with what it shows (location, date, or subject)?

checks.name: Content Identifiable
checks.prompt: Can the purpose or content of this page be determined?
